thread.title: Trump and Japan: A Contentious Friendship for Investors - WSJ
thread.title_full: Trump and Japan: A Contentious Friendship for Investors - WSJ

author: Anjani Trivedi
title: Trump and Japan: A Contentious Friendship for Investors - WSJ
text:
Beef, cars and especially currencies. That is what investors need to worry about when it comes to President Donald Trump’s posture toward Japan.

Mr. Trump lambasted Japan for manipulating its currency last week, ahead of a meeting later this week with Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, putting Japanese officials on the defensive. The comments added to Mr. Trump’s earlier suggestions that Japan was responsible for the U.S. trade deficit,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
